2025.query: Workday HCM ERP competitors 2025 enterprise cloud applications
2025.context: Workday, Inc. is a enterprise cloud applications company focused on HCM, finance, and planning software for enterprises. Enterprise cloud leader. Competing with SAP, Oracle.

competitors.name: Oracle Fusion Cloud HCM
competitors.notes: Global enterprise-level HR platform connecting HR, payroll, and workforce management with Oracle's ERP/finance systems. AI-driven workforce modeling, deep compliance tools, and ERP-native integration. Chosen by multinationals with complex workforces across multiple geographies

competitors.name: SAP SuccessFactors
competitors.notes: Cloud-based HCM suite for multinational enterprises wanting to unify HR/payroll with SAP's business ecosystem. Deep ERP integration, global localization in 100+ countries, advanced talent management. Preferred when running SAP for finance/supply chain

competitors.name: Ceridian Dayforce
competitors.notes: Global HCM software with in-depth functionality for workforce management, benefits, talent management, document management, and HR analytics. Seamlessly combines several HR functions into one solution

competitors.name: UKG Pro (formerly UltiPro)
competitors.notes: Cloud-based HCM for mid-sized to large organizations offering end-to-end workforce management. Comprehensive payroll processing, employee record management, compliance tracking, scheduling, recruiting, onboarding, and performance management

competitors.name: Rippling
competitors.notes: All-in-one platform built on single source of truth, integrating HR, IT, and finance tools. Most comprehensive HCM solution with flexibility, automation capabilities, and user-friendly interface for businesses of all sizes

competitors.name: ADP Workforce Now
competitors.notes: Scalable solution serving businesses from startups to large enterprises. Features include payroll processing, time/attendance, talent management, benefits administration, and AI-driven insights

competitors.name: Paylocity
competitors.notes: Strong focus on mid-market and employee engagement with community platform for internal communication. Includes peer-to-peer recognition and automated surveys to gauge employee sentiment

competitors.name: Infor CloudSuite HCM
competitors.notes: Potent HCM solution providing full global HR and task management in single system, with complete suite integrated with talent and workforce management

competitors.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Human Resources
competitors.notes: Cloud-based HR solution with core HR functionality, benefits, compensation, leave/absences, compliance, payroll integrations, and workforce insights

competitors.name: Paycom
competitors.notes: Rated as best overall Workday HCM alternative by G2
